backend/main.mo: Canister actor implementing access control, user approvals, profiles, and match-related types with admin-gated mutations and invite-only mode.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three MatchHistoryTable-related frontend requirements and their associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend components, pages, and their responsibilities across the app.
frontend/docs/v48-modecard-resume-button: Documentation of a UI-only change swapping the order of Start New Game and Resume Game buttons in ModeCard.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, light/dark palettes, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry wiring TanStack Router routes, theming, AuthGate, layout, and query client setup.
frontend/src/components/accepting-gifts/: Table component showing Accepting Gifts win/loss stats by ball count or a placeholder when empty.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaBallButto: Clickable APA ball button styled by scoring state with accessibility labels and optional disabling.
frontend/src/components/apa/apaBallStyle: Defines ball state types, values, labels, and rack total calculations including the one‑away 9‑ball rule.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaRackScori: Manages rack-level scoring, ball states, auto-dead logic, inning flow, and emits live or final rack results.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaResultsSu: Displays final match results including winner, points, innings, defensive shots, and PPI for both players.
frontend/src/components/apa/RealApaMatch: Handles creating or editing an official APA match entry with validation, connection checks, and save/update logic.
frontend/src/components/apa/useApaInning: Tracks active player, shared innings, and turn flow with helpers for scoring and inning calculation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Controls access based on authentication, approval, admin status, and invite‑only mode, gating children accordingly.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button tied to Internet Identity with query cache clearing and retry handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for creating or editing a user profile, handling connection readiness, form state, and profile-saving mutations.
frontend/src/components/history/MatchHis: Sortable match history table with row selection, deletion, and per-bucket running win–loss statistics.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Top-level app layout with header navigation, connection status, profile setup handling, and routed content.
frontend/src/components/matches/DeleteMa: Button with confirmation dialog to delete a match and redirect or call a callback after deletion.
frontend/src/components/matches/EndMatch: Reusable confirmation dialog for ending a match with customizable text and pending state.
frontend/src/components/matches/MatchSum: Card summarizing a match with mode-specific labels and concise descriptive text based on match data.
frontend/src/components/navigation/ModeC: Card for selecting a play mode, supporting start and resume actions based on in-progress sessions.
frontend/src/components/players/ApaAggre: Generates two Recharts line charts showing PPI, aPPI, match points, and defensive shots with custom timestamp tooltips.
frontend/src/components/straight-shot/St: Builds a histogram of straight-shot counts using a bar chart generated from frequency-mapped shot data.
Displays a summary table of wins, losses, and first-win dates grouped by ball count.
Renders a composed bar/line chart for straight-shot trends with date labels and detailed timestamp tooltips.
frontend/src/dev/straight-shot-spot-chec: Provides a manual QA checklist for validating Straight Shot session creation, saving, history display, and win/loss logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorRetry.ts: Offers a helper to clear and refetch the cached actor query for retrying connection.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, login handling, identity persistence, and related status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for matches, user profiles, and settings, using the backend actor for CRUD operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/accepting-gifts/accepti: Defines the 12-level Accepting Gifts progression system with helpers for clamping, lookup, max attempts, and baseline updates.
Implements session state for Accepting Gifts, applying attempt results and preparing next sets.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaAggregateStats.t: Extracts APA match data into normalized datapoints and computes aggregate series for charting.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaEqualizer.ts: Provides APA skill-level validation and maps 9-ball skill levels to required points-to-win with simple formatters.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaMatchPoints.ts: Contains the APA 20‑point conversion chart and types for determining match‑point outcomes based on loser SL and points.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaPracticeMatchOut: Computes APA Practice match outcomes using targets, winner detection, and match‑point parsing from the chart.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaScoring.ts: Defines APA 9‑ball rack scoring logic, PPI calculation, validation helpers, and per‑player stat accumulation.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaSkillLevelPredic: Predicts APA skill level from PPI or aPPI using predefined numeric ranges.
frontend/src/lib/apa/officialApaExpected: Defines expected PPI lookup rows, the official table, and helpers to bucket win% and fetch expected PPI by skill level.
Computes match outcomes from skill levels and scores, with helpers to parse scores and fall back to saved didWin.
frontend/src/lib/apa/officialApaPpi.ts: Provides PPI and aPPI calculators, including parsing inputs, computing contextual win%, and deriving aPPI using outcomes and expected PPI.
frontend/src/lib/history/matchHistoryRow: Builds human-readable match result strings and derives outcomes for multiple match modes including Accepting Gifts.
frontend/src/lib/history/matchWinLoss.ts: Derives win/loss outcomes across match modes and defines helpers for categorizing and evaluating matches.
frontend/src/lib/matches/effectiveMatchD: Parses and normalizes match dates, preferring official log dates, and computes timestamps and formatted display strings.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuilders.t: Constructs Official APA match log records, deriving didWin from inputs, and re-exports other match builders.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuildersOr: Builds an APA 9-ball practice match record, generating player stats, outcomes, and metadata.
frontend/src/lib/session/inProgressSessi: Provides helpers for tracking, clearing, and listing per-mode in‑progress sessions via sessionStorage.
frontend/src/lib/stats/acceptingGiftsPer: Computes win/loss counts for Accepting Gifts matches grouped by starting ball count (2–7).
frontend/src/lib/stats/acceptingGiftsSta: Calculates total sessions and rolling averages for Accepting Gifts based on ending object ball counts.
Generates official APA stats including wins, win rate, and average PPI/APPI from match history.
frontend/src/lib/stats/straightShotStats: Computes Straight Shot trends, averages, histograms, and summary rows from recorded matches.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/accepting-gifts/Accep: Loads and manages an Accepting Gifts session, handling attempts, set transitions, session persistence, and match completion flow.
Displays the rules, level structure, and progression system for the Accepting Gifts drill.
Initializes or resumes an Accepting Gifts session, letting the user select a starting level and confirming overwrites.
Restores and manages an APA practice session, tracking rack scoring, match progression, and saving when complete.
frontend/src/pages/apa/PracticeStartPage: Collects player names and skill levels to start a new APA practice match, handling validation and in‑progress session checks.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchEditP: Loads an existing official APA match log and displays a form to edit its details.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchPlace: Provides a standalone form for creating a new official APA match log after the match is completed.
frontend/src/pages/auth/AccessNotAllowed: Displays an invite‑only access notice and allows users to request access via a mutation with success or duplicate‑request handling.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchDetailsP: Shows detailed information for a specific match, including APA-specific stats and navigation to player aggregates.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchHistoryP: Lists all matches with sorting, filtering, and card/table view modes across APA, gifts, and straight‑shot categories.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main app landing page with navigation cards for all game modes and match history.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerApprovalsP: Admin page for managing user approvals and invite‑only mode, supporting approving/rejecting individuals or all pending users.
frontend/src/pages/players/PlayerAggrega: Displays a player's APA aggregate stats, predicted skill levels, and charts computed from historical match data.
frontend/src/pages/SmokeCheckPage.tsx: Provides a deployment smoke‑test page with basic navigation checks and verification steps.
frontend/src/pages/stats/MatchupsPage.ts: Provides opponent-based match filtering and win/loss stats across multiple match modes using all recorded matches.
frontend/src/pages/stats/StatsPage.tsx: Loads user and match data, computes multiple stats, and renders tabbed APA, Straight Shot, and Accepting Gifts analytics with navigation.
frontend/src/pages/straight-shot/Straigh: Manages an in‑progress Straight Shot game session, syncing state to sessionStorage and saving completed matches to the backend.
Displays the rules and objectives for the Straight Shot drill in a styled card.
Initializes or resumes a Straight Shot session, shows recent performance stats, and handles start/resume confirmation logic.
frontend/src/utils/errorText.ts: Extracts a readable message from various error types, handling nested and serialized error objects.
frontend/src/utils/playerName.ts: Provides utilities for normalizing and comparing player names case‑insensitively.
frontend/src/utils/playerRoutes.ts: Builds a URL path for navigating to a player's stats page.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback and hash support.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout that rejects if the operation exceeds a specified duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including required fixes for per‑mode running W‑L/Win% and restoring sortable date behavior, along with related feature metadata and known issues.
